channel.title: Organization on Jens Rantil
channel.description: Recent content in Organization on Jens Rantil

item.title: Tools for innovation in tech
item.description:
Innovation is the skill of going from idea to action. If innovation is low, ideas risk getting lost or discarded and you risk missing out on great opportunities.

As a tech organization, how do you make sure that you are innovating? In my opinion, innovation doesn’t “just happen”. It’s part of Creative Management. While the dream scenario is that any engineers can propose an idea to work on within their team sprint, I have seen multiple reasons why this fails:
